name: Serj Ukkarian's mother
content:
The mother of Serj Ukkarian was a female human. Along with her husband and son, she was one of thousands of colonists travelling to the Outer Rim Territories aboard the freighter Legacy Run when it was destroyed in the Great Hyperspace Disaster. Ukkarian's parents were both in the twelfth division of the starship at the time, and although he survived, his parents had not been located.
Serj Ukkarian's mother first mentioned in the 2021 novel The High Republic: Light of the Jedi.
